external_games.name: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer

name: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer
storyline: Furry Shades of Gay 3 is a collection of hot novels with choice and match-3 elements! You'll find new stories, new (and old!) characters, and a new, more diverse match-3 experience. Go through all the stories, uncover all the plot options, and unlock 15 hot voiced animations!
summary: Furry Shades of Gay 3 gets even steamier and funnier with new stories, new characters and new features! Go through all the branches and see new, longer animations with more varied poses, and for the first time in the series, voice acting!
